price: کە نیشانی یەکتری دەدرێن، تاوانبار ئاوات دەخوازێت کە (قوربانی) بدایە لەبری ڕزگار بوونی خۆی لە سزای ئەو ڕۆژە بە کوڕەکانی
arabic: يُبَصَّرُونَهُمۡۚ يَوَدُّ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُ لَوۡ يَفۡتَدِي مِنۡ عَذَابِ يَوۡمِئِذِۭ بِبَنِيهِ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yubaṣṣarūnahum yawaddu al-muj'rimu law yaftadī min ʿadhābi yawmi-idhin bibanīhi
translations: They will be made to see each other
